channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Tim Blake Nelson Wrote a Novel About Superhero Actors
item.description: It's called 'Superhero,' based on Nelson's own experiences within the genre, and it's out now for you to read.

item.title: This new MVNO wants to let users pay with crypto - but security scrutiny may mean it never sees the light of day
item.description: Phreeli launches a privacy-oriented MVNO allowing crypto payments, eSIM activation, and unlimited plans, with security focused on compartmentalized data management.

item.title: Heated Rivalry stars teased as Quinn’s latest audio erotica additions
item.description: 'Heated Rivalry' stars Hudson Williams and Connor Storrie teased as Quinn’s latest audio erotica additions

item.title: FaZe Clan’s future is uncertain after influencers depart
item.description: Six influencers recently announced that they are leaving esports group FaZe Clan following unsuccessful contract negotiations with new management.

item.title: 10 impossibly small Japanese laptops under 1Kg that you will probably never be able to buy (unless you fly there)
item.description: Ten impossibly small Japanese laptops under 1kg - but you'll probably never be able to buy.

item.title: Trump administration seeks to deport hate speech researcher previously sued by X
item.description: A federal judge has temporarily blocked the U.S. Department of State from arresting or deporting Imran Ahmed, CEO of the Center for Countering Digital Hate.

item.title: Get an Amazon Echo Dot for Christmas? Discover the 3 features that revolutionized my smart home setup
item.description: Whether you were on the nice list or just decided to treat yourself, I’m gifting you with three Alexa features you’ll be glad you tried.

item.title: Why Is Wonder Woman Like This?
item.description: Between 'Wonder Woman 1984' and her game getting canned, the 2020s haven't been Diana's decade. Maybe that'll change with the 2030s?

item.title: Here’s the first real look at the Retroid Pocket 6 running PS2 games
item.description:
The Retroid Pocket 6 may have gotten off to a rocky start, but the gaming handheld is officially completed and going to see its first shipments soon. The handheld maker revealed the final product shots of the Retroid Pocket 6 in black and orange on X. Along with in-person product pics, Retroid revealed gameplay videos of its handheld, running emulation of PlayStation 2 games.
For those looking to relive some classic Nintendo or PlayStation titles, the Retroid Pocket 6 offers a great entry point into the retro handheld world since it can emulate games up to Nintendo Switch and PS2. However, Re...

item.title: I’m TechRadar’s reviews editor – here are the 5 best gadgets I’ve tested all year
item.description: I’m in charge of reviews here at TechRadar – these are the 5 best gadgets I personally tested in 2025.
